reviews.review: Yes, I would recommend this game, because its multiplayer is awesome, and the user-generated rooms are even better, and the single player is so awesome, so in all, I bought it again because I used a different account.
This is portal 2, an amazing and also inexpensive game

It is a good game. Graphics are amazing. Story is amazing. Gameplay is amazing. Music is amazing. Everything about this is amazing. They even have an area for making your own levels, which gives it the ability to be replayed and still be fun. Even the creators (Valve) think that this is the best game they have ever made. Wished there was a third (official) game. Portal Stories: Mel is cool, I just wished Valve cared more about not only portal, but their other games as well. Sure, some of these games did get other games for their series, like Half-Life Alyx, or Aperture Hand Lab. The only issue is that those games is that they aren't "threequels". Half-Life Alyx is a prequel of Half-Life 2, Aperture Hand Lab, I'm not even sure when this takes place, but it's definitely not after the events of Portal 2. In short, Portal 2 (and most of other Valve's games) is good, the only issue is that the company dislikes "threequels". Also a "threequel" is like a third title in a series, forgot to mention that. I recommend playing this if you can get your hands on it.

Portal is that kind of game that I didn't thought I'd enjoy, but that I end up loving. Portal 2 has a amazing story, very good graphics, audio and gameplay. The puzzle are well thought out and the environment is amazing. This portal is way better then the first one. It also has steam workshop support so the community can make extra maps. This game is a no brainer and you should definitely play it!
One of the best games i played in my life :)

Portal 2 was one of the first games I ever fell in love with. Back in 2012, I fell in love with its music, its humor, its level design, the whole lot. In a way, it kickstarted my efforts to learn to make music. 

Now, 10 years later, after watching people play it over and over again, I've finally played it for myself. It was truly a delight to be reacquainted with the colorful characters and exhilarating soundtrack that made me fall in love with games.
 
Thanks Valve, for one of the best games that has ever graced my screen.

I keep returning to this game, the first instalment was a masterpiece of course,  and I had no idea how they could make a sequel that would hold a candle to it. They did it by adding polish, a great story and amazing voice actors. Absolutely love the genius behind both the script and the puzzle.
Great puzzle game, interesting variety and a fun story.

O Portal 2 pegou de tudo que o 1 fez de bom(praticamente o jogo inteiro porque beira a perfeicao o 1) e melhora nessa sequencia , serio se tu jogou o 1 jogue se nao jogou o 1 compre ele e jogue para jogar esse daqui , pqp a historia e foda pra aralho a gLADOS mais engracada e do jeitinho que ela pode ser :) as desafios mais desafiadores para o meu cerebro de macaco pensante sem falar do coop kkkkkkkkkkkkkkk serio demorei para um krl porque 2 cabecas de macacos nao funcionam juntos mas consegui terminar e sinto que meu QI de 1 foi para 10 , obrigado valve por criar esse classico eterno e RIP Portal 3..., enfim recomendo para todos que querem um desafio e dica se terminar e quiser um gostinho de quero mais aqui na steam tem dois mods de portal 2 feitos por fans que sao meio que continuacoes do Portal 2 recomendo par aralho.
Nota : gLAADOS/10
